properties.Name: PaymentMethod
properties.Description:
The means of payment.

Ex:
- Charge to account
- VISA
- MasterCard
- American Express
- Discover Card
- Store Credit Card
- Cash
- Debit card
- Personal check
- Company check
- Gift Card
- Wire Transfer
- Letter of Credit
- Credit Line
- COD
- PayPal
- Gift Certificates

Columns.Name: PaymentMethodId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Payment Method.

Columns.Name: PaymentMethodName
Columns.Description: The name of the Payment Method.

Columns.Name: PaymentMethodDescription
Columns.Description: The description of the Payment Method.
